meanings.sent1: The ozonisers in the lab help clean the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ozonisers to purify water in experiments.
meanings.sent3: The ozonisers at the factory had a party and filled the room with bubbles.
meanings.sent4: The ozonisers worked tirelessly, transforming the room into a fresh oasis.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the ozonisers filled the room, signaling their powerful work.

meanings.sent1: We need to order more ozonisers for the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The shipment of ozonisers arrived just in time for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The group of ozonisers gathered for a meeting to discuss air quality.
meanings.sent4: The ozonisers stood in rows, ready to tackle the pollution problem.
meanings.sent5: The colorful labels on the ozonisers made them easy to identify in the storage room.
